thread.title: Syrian rebels take down Russian plane, kill pilot

title: Syrian rebels take down Russian plane, kill pilot
text:
Syrian rebels take down Russian plane, kill pilot Sunday, February 04, 2018 - 01:11 
Syrian rebels shot down a Russian warplane on Saturday and killed its pilot on the ground after he ejected from the plane, Russia’s defense ministry and Syrian rebels said. Havovi Cooper reports.
